vista.app
Class GroupTree

java.lang.Object
  vista.app.GroupTree

public class GroupTree
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates a tree which is a view onto the Group. As the TreeModel is not efficient to implement in terms of a Group's linear structure the DefaultMutableTreeNode objects are used to construct the tree using the parts of the pathname. Displays a group as a tree in which parts of the pathname are nodes. For example the pathname /A/B/C/D/E/F would be found by default at root A then node B, then C and so on. This default path display can be shuffled so that other parts could be the root or at a different node level. This class only constructs the tree .The display of the tree is done by JTree.

Version:

Author:
Nicky Sandhu

Method Detail

setPartAdditionOrder

public void setPartAdditionOrder(int[] partOrder)
An array of indices from 0..5 shuffled to create a tree with different part addition scenarios. This shuffles the level of the node within the tree.

returns the updated tree.
